divs: sighting detailsi was just coming home from being out on a drive with my husband and son, it was around 7:30pm, the sun was setting but the sky was still light and it was clear. as we parked the car i noticed this white streak in the sky just sitting stationary. i'm a constant sky observer, so at first i thought it was a chem trail line. but then i realized the line wasn't getting any longer. the fact that this line was so bright it seemed as if it was a fresh chem trail, but when it didn't get any bigger i realized right away this was a craft. i ran inside to get my camera, which took all of 1 minute, by the time i ran back out it had moved considerably farther away. at first the "line" from my distance was like the length of a foot, when i came back out it was 3\4 less in size. i scrambled to take a picture, which isn't great because of it's distance by that point. right after i took the picture i saw it fade off to the point where it was no longer visible to me. the craft must have been a disc or a cigar shape, because of the fact that to me it just looked like a streak in the sky. i'm not sure what the color was it looked white or silver-ish, it definitely looked like it was either illuminated or reflecting the light from the setting sun. when i was observing it from my point of view, i could see that it must have been clearly visibly from downtown stamford. the picture that i have was taken right before it disappeared from my line of sight. it's not the greatest photo, and i am sure people will argue that it's just a cloud or a random spot in my photo. but we all know it was a ufo. :)
